dct_title_s: Mexican Petroleum Corp. Fuel Oil Station, Passaic N.J.
dct_description_sm: Drawing of two existing tanks and proposed tank structure for the fuel oil station of Mexican Petroleum Corporation. Map also includes an inset section of Fire Wall and inset section of Wharf.
Source map supplied by New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection
Part 3 of 3 sheets stapled together of Mexican Petroleum Corporation
